on_join_message:
Hi all! TwitchPlaysArmA3 reporting in! During the game you'll be presented with some choices that will influence the mission.

	In order to vote, simply type in chat the name of your chosen option. For example, for "W - Weapons" you can type "W" or "Weapons". Case doesn't matter.
on_new_vote: A new vote is starting! Vote for {0}:
